definition: lower elementary school (abbr. to 初小[chu1 xiao3])
to concentrate on trivial points while neglecting the main problem (idiom)

sentences.english: Chapter three explores how to lead the primary school language teaching into the local culture of study in primary schools.
sentences.chinese: 第三章探究了小學語文教學引入如東地方文化的實踐。

sentences.english: Therefore, how can I not love the warm wash carvedilol primary large group?
sentences.chinese: 因此，我怎能不愛洗洛小學這個溫暖的大集體？

sentences.english: To his surprise, the new neighbor is his primary school.
sentences.chinese: 令他驚訝的是，這個新鄰居竟然是他的小學同學。

sentences.english: The development history, teacher and student resources, reform of the education contents and methods, funds and school-house building of the primary education of Henan province were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分，主要考察河南省小學教育的發展歷程。

sentences.english: Everyone learns the rudiments of arithmetic in elementary school.
sentences.chinese: 在小學，每個人都學習入門算術。

sentences.english: It is showing no difference for basic concept of school mental - health education.
sentences.chinese: 中小學心理健康教育的基本概念衆說紛紜，莫衷一是。

sentences.english: Please speak English when you come to Guangming Primary School.
sentences.chinese: 一進入光明小學，請說英語。

sentences.english: Objective To study the poor eyesight situation of the students in the Xingning city and countryside.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解廣東省興寧市城鄉中小學生視力不良狀況。

sentences.english: Please tell me on which days students in primary schools and high schools can visit the summer palace for free.
sentences.chinese: 請告訴我在哪天小學和高中生可以免費參觀頤和園？

sentences.english: Content Analysis Study on Character Education in Textbooks of Learning Area of Integrated …
sentences.chinese: 臺灣國民小學中年級綜合活動領域教科書融入品德。

sentences.english: Philology prevailed very much in Qing Dynasty and especially many top-ranking scholars ever studied it at that time.
sentences.chinese: 清代小學極其昌盛，第一流的學者對小學均多所研究。

sentences.english: Philology prevailed very much in Qing Dynasty and especially many top-ranking scholars ever studied it at that time.
sentences.chinese: 清代小學極其昌盛，第一流的學者對小學均多所研究。

sentences.english: Villagers built Ruiyuan themselves to improve their children's opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 村民們修建了瑞元小學，以期改善子女的教育境況。

sentences.english: Football has a good public basis and tradition in the prefectures of kashgar and kerkyz, Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: 足球運動在新疆中小學校具有良好的羣衆基礎和傳統。

sentences.english: Strongly appeal on the change in the role of primary school teachers in curriculum innovation.
sentences.chinese: 新課改對小學語文教師角色轉變的呼喚異常強烈。

definition: the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
to go to school/to attend school
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to read a book/to study/to attend school
head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
